There are two different methods to book a time.


## Method 1. WVU Students

Right-click the below link, and choose to *open in a new private browser window.* Then continue as an anonymous user

[Right-click here and choose private window](https://outlook.office.com/bookwithme/user/12414cb0519440e68f70cc1fb2a63fac@mail.wvu.edu?anonymous)
